item.title: Siddaramanand Puri Swami laid to rest with state honours at Raichur’s Kanaka Guru Peetha ground
item.description:
<![CDATA[Siddaramanand Puri Swami, Peethadhipathi of Kanaka Guru Peetha (Gulbarga division), who died following a heart attack, was laid to rest at the Kanaka Guru Peetha’s ground in Tinthini bridge, in Deodurga taluk of Raichur district, on Thursday with state honours after police personnel opened a third round of fire in the air to pay a gun salute as a final mark of respect to the departed soul.
Advertisement Advertisement
The last rites of 55-year-old Swami were followed by Halumath culture. A trad...]]>
